1: <sup>1</sup> If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
2: <sup>2</sup> If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
3: <sup>3</sup> Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
4: <sup>4</sup> Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
5: <sup>5</sup> Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
6: <sup>6</sup> Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
7: <sup>7</sup> Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
8: <sup>8</sup> Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
